## TransformTransactionParams.startTransaction property

Transforms the transaction before any other actions are done to it.

This is useful for updating the transaction value before a command does it's work and helps prevent multiple dispatches.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startTransaction?: TransactionTransformer<GSchema>;
```
